alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 3:54AM PST until February 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet with highest waves from mid lake to north and east shores. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...From 12 noon today to 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusts of 80 mph or more are likely over Sierra ridges. Expect impacts to outdoor recreation, ski lift operations, and localized tree damage.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
